name: TrelloSearch
description:
Search for information within Trello.

Use this tool to find cards, boards, members, and other elements in Trello by searching with specific keywords.

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: The search query string, with a length between 1 and 16384 characters.

value_schema.description: The search query with a length of 1 to 16384 characters

parameters.name: board_identifiers
parameters.description: Specify 'mine' to search all your boards or provide a comma-separated list of Board IDs.

value_schema.description: `mine` or a comma-separated list of Board IDs

parameters.name: organization_ids
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of Trello Organization IDs to filter the search results.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of Organization IDs

parameters.name: card_ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of Trello Card IDs to search within.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of Card IDs

parameters.name: trello_object_types
parameters.description: Specify types of Trello objects to search, such as 'all', 'actions', 'boards', 'cards', 'members', or 'organizations'. Use a comma-separated list.

value_schema.description: What type or types of Trello objects you want to search. all or a comma-separated list of: `actions`, `boards`, `cards`, `members`, `organizations`

parameters.name: board_fields_selection
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of board fields to return or 'all' for every field. Options include: closed, dateLastActivity, etc.

value_schema.description: all or a comma-separated list of: `closed`, `dateLastActivity`, `dateLastView`, `desc`, `descData`, `idOrganization`, `invitations`, `invited`, `labelNames`, `memberships`, `name`, `pinned`, `powerUps`, `prefs`, `shortLink`, `shortUrl`, `starred`, `subscribed`, `url`

parameters.name: maximum_boards_returned
parameters.description: The maximum number of boards to return. Must be an integer up to 1000.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of boards returned. Maximum: 1000

parameters.name: card_fields
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of card fields like 'badges', 'desc', 'labels'. Defaults to 'all' if omitted.

value_schema.description: all or a comma-separated list of: `badges`, `checkItemStates`, `closed`, `dateLastActivity`, `desc`, `descData`, `due`, `idAttachmentCover`, `idBoard`, `idChecklists`, `idLabels`, `idList`, `idMembers`, `idMembersVoted`, `idShort`, `labels`, `manualCoverAttachment`, `name`, `pos`, `shortLink`, `shortUrl`, `subscribed`, `url`

parameters.name: maximum_cards_to_return
parameters.description: The maximum number of cards to return. Maximum value is 1000.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of cards to return. Maximum: 1000

parameters.name: cards_page_number
parameters.description: Specify the page number for card search results. Maximum value is 100.

value_schema.description: The page of results for cards. Maximum: 100

parameters.name: include_card_attachments
parameters.description: Specify 'true' to include all attachment objects, 'cover' for only card cover attachments, or 'false' for no attachments.

value_schema.description: Whether to include attachment objects with card results. A boolean value (true or false) or cover for only card cover attachments.

parameters.name: organization_fields_to_return
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of organization attributes like 'billableMemberCount', 'desc', 'displayName', etc., to include in the results.

value_schema.description: all or a comma-separated list of billableMemberCount, desc, descData, displayName, idBoards, invitations, invited, logoHash, memberships, name, powerUps, prefs, premiumFeatures, products, url, website

parameters.name: max_workspaces_to_return
parameters.description: The maximum number of Workspaces to return. Accepts an integer up to 1000.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of Workspaces to return. Maximum 1000

parameters.name: member_fields_selection
parameters.description: Specify which member fields to return. Options: `all` or a comma-separated list of: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url, username.

value_schema.description: all or a comma-separated list of: avatarHash, bio, bioData, confirmed, fullName, idPremOrgsAdmin, initials, memberType, products, status, url, username

parameters.name: max_members_returned
parameters.description: The maximum number of members to return in the search results. Maximum value is 1000.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of members to return. Maximum 1000

parameters.name: include_parent_organization_with_board_results
parameters.description: Include the parent organization in the board results. Set to true to include, false to exclude.

value_schema.description: Whether to include the parent organization with board results

parameters.name: include_parent_board_with_card_results
parameters.description: Set to true to include parent board details in card results.

value_schema.description: Whether to include the parent board with card results

parameters.name: include_card_list
parameters.description: Include the parent list with card results. A boolean value (true or false).

value_schema.description: Whether to include the parent list with card results

parameters.name: include_card_members
parameters.description: Include member objects with card results if set to true; exclude them if false.

value_schema.description: Whether to include member objects with card results

parameters.name: include_card_stickers
parameters.description: Set to true to include sticker objects with card results. Set to false to exclude them.

value_schema.description: Whether to include sticker objects with card results

parameters.name: enable_partial_search
parameters.description: Enable partial search to match content starting with words in your query, allowing for more flexible search results.

value_schema.description: By default, Trello searches for each word in your query against exactly matching words within Member content. Specifying partial to be true means that we will look for content that starts with any of the words in your query.  If you are looking for a Card titled "My Development Status Report", by default you would need to search for "Development". If you have partial enabled, you will be able to search for "dev" but not "velopment".

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.description: The search query with a length of 1 to 16384 characters

value_schema.description: The search query with a length of 1 to 16384 characters

parameters.name: partial
parameters.description: By default, Trello searches for each word in your query against exactly matching words within Member content. Specifying partial to be true means that we will look for content that starts with any of the words in your query.  If you are looking for a Card titled "My Development Status Report", by default you would need to search for "Development". If you have partial enabled, you will be able to search for "dev" but not "velopment".

value_schema.description: By default, Trello searches for each word in your query against exactly matching words within Member content. Specifying partial to be true means that we will look for content that starts with any of the words in your query.  If you are looking for a Card titled "My Development Status Report", by default you would need to search for "Development". If you have partial enabled, you will be able to search for "dev" but not "velopment".
